about.summary: Various helpers to pass trusted data to untrusted environments.

name: itsdangerous
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "itsdangerous" %}
{% set version = "0.24" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash = "cbb3fcf8d3e33df861709ecaf89d9e6629cff0a217bc2848f1b41cd30d360519" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - itsdangerous

about:
  home: https://github.com/pallets/itsdangerous
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Various helpers to pass trusted data to untrusted environments.
  doc_url: http://pythonhosted.org/itsdangerous

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - goanpeca
